cu.explanation_en: Setting DRB ciphering to an invalid enum 'maybe' will cause configuration validation errors and prevent proper security setup for data radio bearers.

du.explanation_en: Setting the absolute frequency for SSB to a negative value of -1 will violate frequency range constraints and cause synchronization failures during cell setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 的絕對頻率設定為負值 -1，將違反頻率範圍約束，並在小區設定期間導致同步失敗。
